# Iteration 08 — Polish & Difficulty

## Goal

Improve game feel without changing core mechanics.

At the end of this iteration:
- Movement feels better
- Difficulty increases slightly
- UI feedback is clearer
- Game still works exactly the same

This iteration is about **feel**, not features.

---

## Files Allowed to Touch

- js/player.js
- js/obstacles.js
- style.css

❌ No new files  
❌ No new mechanics  
❌ No new rules

---

## Allowed Improvements

- Adjust movement speed
- Slightly increase obstacle speed over time
- Add simple CSS transitions
- Improve spacing and readability
- Add visual feedback (colors, borders)

---

## Forbidden

- New power-ups
- New enemies
- New screens
- New logic
- Refactoring architecture

---

## Validation Checklist

Before moving on:
- Game feels smoother
- No bugs introduced
- MVP still small
- Code still readable

---

## Stop Rule

This is the final iteration.

When finished:
- Commit
- Tag release `v1.0.0`
- Stop working
